description: This file defines an interface for message bus operations in the RdkXdslManager component, including function prototypes for engaging, initializing, finalizing, checking the bus, and freeing resources.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus for the specified component with a given configuration file and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the message bus interface using user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check on the message bus status.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, given a priority and user data.
